member.name: T:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel
member.summary:
A base class for all view models, inheriting from the . This class provides default implementations for the and methods. Override those to implement setup/teardown when a page/view is appearing and disappearing to/from the screen respectively.
NOTE: using this class requires your page/view to inherit from .

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.#ctor
member.summary: Create an instance of a .

member.name: P:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.IsBound
member.summary: Returns true if the viewmodel is bound, i.e. its parent page has appeared on screen.

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.Bind
member.summary: Called by the parent page when it appears on screen.

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.Unbind
member.summary: Called by the parent page when it disappears from screen.

member.name: P:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.Children
member.summary: Gets the child view models.

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.AddChildViewModel``1(``0)
member.summary: Use this method when nesting view models. This is the viewmodel equivalent of master/detail pages.

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.RemoveChildViewModel``1(``0)
member.summary: Use this method when nesting view models. This is the viewmodel equivalent of master/detail pages.

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.DoBind
member.summary: Override this method to do view model specific setup when it's parent page/view appears on screen.

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.DoUnbind
member.summary: Override this method to do view model specific teardown when it's parent page/view disappears from screen.

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.RestoreState
member.summary: Called by the parent page when it appears on screen, after the method is called.

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.SaveState
member.summary: Called by the parent page when it disappears on screen, before the method is called.

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.Shutdown
member.summary: Convenience method that calls and then .

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.DoRestoreState
member.summary: Override this method to do view model specific restoring of state when it's parent page/view appears on screen.

member.name: M:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.ViewModels.BaseViewModel.DoSaveState
member.summary: Override this method to do view model specific saving of state when it's parent page/view disappears from screen.

member.summary: A base class for all pages. This class works in close conjunction with the for binding and unbinding data when the page is shown on screen.
member.remarks: It also handles safe area insets for iOS applications, specifically on iPhones with the 'rabbit ear' displays.

member.name: T:Tag.Neuron.Xamarin.UI.Views.FlipView
member.summary: The FlipView is a user control that holds two child controls: a and a . It can be flipped like a coin when the user taps on it. In order to flip the view, simply call the method.

member.summary: Makes the user control flip from front to back, or the other way around.
